text: COS3751 Â©ornelis Dubbelman-48269328 Page 4 of 12 Question 3 Adversarial Search [14] Consider the following game tree and then answer the questions that follow (the static utility values for the leaf nodes are provided below each leaf node) A D E F G H I B J C 7 K 5 L 4 M 9 N 10 P 203 O Q 25 R 22 (a) Which choice should Max make (move B or move C)?
